name: 3-Nen B-Gumi Kinpachi Sensei: Densetsu no Kyoudan ni Tate!
synopsis: ''3-Nen B-Gumi Kinpachi Sensei: Densetsu no Kyoudan ni Tate!'' is a "role-playing drama" that is based on the long running television drama ''3-nen B-gumi Kinpachi-sensei'' about a teacher named Kinpachi Sakamoto who helps his students through their educational and personal struggles.
